page.title: 10LODGE FARM
page.content: LODGE FARM IS A HOUSE & FARM BUILT IN THE VICTORIAN/RED BRICK ERA.{COLONEL & MRS.JACKSON (AND HER MOTHER) HAVE LIVED THERE FOR 6 YEARS SINCE HIS RETIREMENT FROM THE ARMY.THE FARM HAS LARGE GROUNDS OF 36-40 ACRES AND THEY BREED CATTLE. IN THE GROUNDS IS A THATCHER'S WORKSHOP AND A HELICOPTER HANGAR FOR MR JACKSON'S OWN HELICOPTER WHICH HE USES TO SPRAY THE FIELDS.THEY SEEM LIKE A VERY TRADITIONAL FAMILY (EVEN THOUGH THE OLD LADY LIKES DURAN DURAN) AS THEIR INTERESTS INCLUDE ANTIQUES AND CLASSICAL MUSIC. THERE IS AN OLD TALE ABOUT A SECRET TUNNEL WHICH WAS SUPPOSED TO RUN FROM THE FARM TO SWALCLIFFE BUT IT CANNOT BE PROVED AS THE CELLAR ROOF COLLAPSED A FEW YEARS AGO.THE ORIGINAL NAME OF THE FARM WAS TURPIN FARM AS DICK TURPIN IS SAID TO HAVE STAYED THERE.
